name: Cosmic
headline: Cosmic is a headless CMS and API toolkit
description:
Cosmic is a headless CMS and API toolkit to help teams build modern apps faster, together. We provide a web dashboard to create content and API tools to deliver content into any website or app.

Teams benefit from using Cosmic because it eliminates the need to build and maintain their own CMS infrastructure. Teams pay a monthly subscription fee for our hosted CMS and can focus on their application logic, creating great content, and enhancing user experiences.

founders.name: Tony Spiro, Founder
founders.description: My name is Tony Spiro (Cosmic W2019) I'm interested in solving problems with technology. Find me on Twitter: @tonyspiro

# The Intelligent CMS
Cosmic helps your team build and ship content powered apps faster.
[Start building](https://www.cosmicjs.com/<https:/app.cosmicjs.com/signup>)[Contact sales](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</contact#sales-form>)
[![Dashboard screenshot](https://imgix.cosmicjs.com/087542a0-2819-11ee-a19d-717742939f83-hero.png?auto=compression,format&w=1200)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/<https:/app.cosmicjs.com/signup>)

## What can you build with Cosmic?
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Company websites](https://www.cosmicjs.com)Company websitesManage content efficiently and equip your entire team.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/company-websites>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Mobile apps](https://www.cosmicjs.com)Mobile appsDeliver content to every user, regardless of their device.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/mobile-apps>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Ecommerce](https://www.cosmicjs.com)EcommerceStreamline product experiences without server or maintenance worries.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/ecommerce>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Blogs & news websites](https://www.cosmicjs.com)Blogs & news websitesDraft, schedule, preview, and publish valuable content with the world.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/blogs>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Website localization](https://www.cosmicjs.com)Website localizationTailor your content to suit a global audience.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/website-localization>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Docs & knowledge bases](https://www.cosmicjs.com)Docs & knowledge basesMaintain and update resourceful content to keep your users informed.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/docs-knowledge-bases>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![Multimedia Management](https://www.cosmicjs.com)Multimedia ManagementStore large amounts of media to feed media-focused sites.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/multimedia-management>)
  * [![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![CRUD Content](https://www.cosmicjs.com)CRUD ContentCreate, read, update, and delete information using Cosmic’s powerful API.](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</solutions/crud-content>)
  * ![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27505%27%20height=%27257%27/%3e)![What will you build?](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
### What will you build?
[Start building](https://www.cosmicjs.com/<https:/app.cosmicjs.com/signup>)[Contact sales](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</contact#sales-form>)

![shelf background](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
## Build
### Powerful developer features
Built for developer speed and productivity.
![Chris Nicholas, DX at Liveblocks](https://imgix.cosmicjs.com/aae125c0-d7f7-11ee-9ce5-59949019255e-Chris-Nicholas.jpg?w=200&h=200&fit=crop&auto=compression,format)
Lovely interface! I like how easy it is to find and create a REST API URL in the Developer Tools tab.
— Chris Nicholas, DX at Liveblocks
### AI assisted development
Use Cosmic Intelligence to seamlessly integrate content into your projects.
### Developer tools built-in
With a robust API and open source SDKs, you have a range of capabilities to integrate with your favorite frameworks and tools.
### Automated workflows
Use webhooks to enable workflow automation and get real-time notifications when your content changes.
### Pairs perfectly with your favorite frameworks and tools
![frameworks and tools](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
### Get started with a template 
Clone a template to learn how to model content in Cosmic and get building now.
#### Agency Website
![Agency Website preview](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
A custom template built using Cosmic's React components, Blocks.
#### Simple Next.js Blog
![Simple Next.js Blog preview](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
A Next.js blog template powered by Cosmic.
[View more templates](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</templates>)
## Create
### Content creation on another level
State-of-the-art tools to craft better content faster.
![Maciek Palmowski, DX at Kinsta](https://imgix.cosmicjs.com/021e4880-d826-11ee-9ce5-59949019255e-Maciek-Palmowski.jpg?w=200&h=200&fit=crop&auto=compression,format)
I'm constantly testing CMSs, and many headless CMSs, while great for developers, aren't that great for users. Cosmic has hit the perfect balance.
— Maciek Palmowski, DX at Kinsta
### Intuitive content editing
Our intuitive content editor makes it easy to manage your content and keep your projects up to date.
### AI powered content generation
Use Cosmic Intelligence to generate content, create summaries, SEO optimized content, translations, and more.
### Easy media management
Easily manage your media resources and keep your projects looking sharp.
## Deliver
### Supercharge your team
Cosmic gives developers more flexibility and content editors more creative control, so companies can ship faster.
![Katie Prowd, COO at Cipher Sports Technology Group](https://imgix.cosmicjs.com/58cc4510-d81c-11ee-9ce5-59949019255e-katie-prowd.jpeg?w=200&h=200&fit=crop&auto=compression,format)
Cosmic frees up more time for our developers and makes our workflow more flexible.
— Katie Prowd, COO at Cipher Sports Technology Group
### Secure collaboration
Designed from the ground up to be secure and easy to use, Cosmic makes it easy to collaborate with your team and keep your projects on track.
### Granular roles and permissions
Granular roles and permissions enable you to invite team members with specific permissions to do their best work.
### Automatic backups
Automatic backups ensure you never lose your work and can quickly restore your content.
## Meet our customers
  * [![FINN logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/finn>)
  * [![MoveSpring logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/movespring>)
  * [![Parque Explora logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/parque-explora>)
  * [![Plato logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/plato>)
  * [![Clever logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/clever>)
  * [![Vuetify logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/vuetify>)
  * [![Tripwire Interactive logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/tripwire-interactive>)
  * [![Cipher Sports Technology Group logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/cipher-sports-technology-group>)
  * [![Joblift logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/joblift>)
  * [![Prairie Robotics logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/prairie-robotics>)
  * [![Erik Olsen logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)](https://www.cosmicjs.com/</customers/erik-olsen>)

## What people are saying
![Software & memes author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Alfdocimo
Software & memes
Just tried Cosmic for the first time I can say it is hands down the best experience I’ve had with a CMS. I was up and running an Astro site within 10 minutes 💫 I have the urge to tell everyone I know.
![Clever Real Estate author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Donovan King
Clever Real Estate
One thing that's fantastic about Cosmic is the customer service. There have been several occasions where we had a direct line via Slack to the CEO and Cosmic had changes pushed the same day.
![Kinsta author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Maciek Palmowski
Kinsta
SDK 🔥 I really love how simple Cosmic's SDK is. Kudos for this.
![MoveSpring author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
John Contreras, CEO
MoveSpring
After discovering Cosmic, our developer was able to get our new blog up and running within days. Cosmic worked exactly how we hoped it would.
![Cipher Sports Technology Group author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Katie Prowd, COO
Cipher Sports Technology Group
Cosmic frees up more time for our developers and makes our workflow more flexible.
![Developer author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Vede
Developer
Probably the best content tool out here✨
![Developer author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
David
Developer
It's going great! So far one of the best UI/UX of a dashboard and probably the fastest CMS I have tried.
![Vuetify author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
John Leider, CEO
Vuetify
It was literally 10 to 15 minutes from taking the SDK, to getting the data I needed, to consuming it. We cut our server response time down from 300-400 ms to about 50 ms. Instead of needing to query the Shopify API, now we only need to query Cosmic.
![Tripwire Interactive author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Owen Liversidge, Lead Developer
Tripwire Interactive
Cosmic allowed us to easily integrate a secure and fast back-end API into our React app. Cosmic fit our needs with its simple web-based dashboard so that members of our marketing team can create, edit, and delete new content on the fly. Our team has been enjoying the ease of use with the new system.
![Content Editor author](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
Sarah
Content Editor
Thank you for the incredible quality of the product you have built. I have tried many CMS's (believe me, many), and I think Cosmic is among the best, if not the best.
![cosmic logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27120%27%20height=%27120%27/%3e)![cosmic logo](https://www.cosmicjs.com)

generated_description:
**Cosmic: The Smart Headless CMS Toolkit**

Founded in 2016 and hailing from the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Cosmic is a headless Content Management System (CMS) designed to transform the way teams create and deliver content. They emerged from Y Combinator’s Batch W19, further solidifying their position in the developer tools arena.

So, what exactly does Cosmic do? At its core, Cosmic equips developers with a powerful API toolkit and a user-friendly web dashboard to craft modern applications swiftly. This allows teams to focus on what truly matters—building great products and enhancing user experiences—without worrying about the hassle of building and maintaining a CMS infrastructure.

***What’s the Big Deal?***

The beauty of Cosmic lies in its simplicity. By subscribing to their service, teams can offload the complicated backend and concentrate on their application logic. Cosmic’s features allow users to manage content for various applications—be it websites, mobile apps, eCommerce platforms, or blogs. Here’s a taste of what they offer:

1. **Multi-Channel Delivery**: Teams can efficiently manage and deliver content to diverse audiences across various platforms.
2. **Developer-First Design**: Built with agility in mind, Cosmic integrates seamlessly with popular frameworks. Developer tools like REST API URLs are just a click away.
3. **AI Integration**: Their AI-assisted features allow for real-time content generation and updates, making it easier to keep pace with the rapidly changing digital landscape.

With a keen focus on collaboration, Cosmic also provides granular user roles and permissions, allowing teams to work securely and efficiently. Automatic backups ensure peace of mind, so content is never lost.

***The Cosmic Experience***

Boasting a lean team of five, Cosmic has made a significant impact in the developer community, earning accolades for its intuitive interface and transparent customer support. Prominent clients—such as Clever, Vuetify, and MoveSpring—point to the responsiveness of Cosmic's team, highlighting how rapid developments and customer feedback are prioritized.

From eCommerce solutions to multimedia management, Cosmic is redefining what it means to be a headless CMS. If you're a developer looking to streamline your workflow and deliver top-notch content experiences without the headaches of traditional CMS management, Cosmic is your go-to solution.

For more information, you can visit their website at [CosmicJS](https://www.cosmicjs.com). 

In a nutshell, Cosmic provides the tools you need to unleash creativity and efficiency in content management without the technical burdens of past systems. If you’re keen on building the future, this might just be the toolkit you didn’t know you needed.
